text: The Football Federation of Azerbaijan (AFFA) () is the governing body of football in Azerbaijan. It organizes the football league, Azerbaijani Premier League, and the Azerbaijani national football team. It is based in Baku. == Other websites == * Football Federation of Azerbaijan Category:Football in Azerbaijan Category:1992 establishments in Azerbaijan Category:Sports organizations of Azerbaijan Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe
title: Association of Football Federations of Azerbaijan
